name: A Roll-Back Story
description:
• Summary:

    If you thought there has to be a story behind every game.Sorry to disappoint you. What this game offers is raw game play.Completing each level should make you feel achieved.By the time you finish this gave you would have attained a few virtues such as Patience.Best of luck. You would need it.

  • Game Play:

    Guide the ball left or right and jump to make progress. You might have to interact with the world as well.
